thread.title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Results

title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Results

organizations.name: madrid masters men's singles results  results reuters

text: May 11, 2018 / 9:37 PM / Updated 34 minutes ago UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read May 12 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles matches on Friday .. Quarter-final .. 5-Dominic Thiem (AUT) beat 1-Rafael Nadal (ESP) 7-5 6-3 6-Kevin Anderson (RSA) beat Dusan Lajovic (SRB) 7-6 3-6 6-3 Denis Shapovalov (CAN) beat Kyle Edmund (GBR) 7-5 6-7(6) 6-4 2-Alexander Zverev (GER) beat 7-John Isner (USA) 6-4 7-5
